question:
Which of the following statements is/ are correct?
1. Rajmahal highlands consist of lava flow deposits
2. Bundelkhand gneiss belongs to the oldest Archaean rocks of India
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Rajmahal hills (Jharkhand) consists of multiple layers of solidified lava made 608 m (1,995 ft) thick. The chief significance of the geology and rocks of India arid-zone is noticed in its remarkable succession of pre-Cambrian rocks which go far down towards the base of the Archaean. The Bundelkhand gneiss is one of the oldest granites exposed anywhere upon the earthâ€™s surface.
